column1: This  case was  decided on 09.03.2017  and the proceedings were terminated.

The  petitioner  made  an  application 
for  a  certified  copy 
the 
judgment
translated in to Sinhala language.  Since this Court has no facilities to issue a

translated  copy  of the  proceedings, 
the  Court  as  a  curtsey  towards 
the
litigants,  made  a  request  to  the  Ministry  of Justice  to  make  available  a
